name: Comet The Cosmic Rabbit
description:
Comet the cosmic rabbit is an upcoming platformer game inspired by classics of the 16-bit era

 Jump, fly, and explore new worlds and how they were in the past and the future. And it is up to you to change the world and make it a better place, and protect it from the claws of the evil Dr. Matrix!

As to this prototype, it is in really early stages, and the final product might be completely different. This demo contains 2 main stages with 4 different time forms and a tutorial level, so new players get used to the mechanics in the game. 

Make sure to follow the official Comet twitter account right here for weekly updates! You can also tell me if you find a bug in the game over twitter or right here on itch.io.

Hope you enjoy and happy holidays!
